en-US.summary: Find restaurants in a location based on cuisine type, or filter by price or Yelp rating
examplePhrases: find good Italian restaurants in Boise
find great Chinese restaurants in Seattle
en-US.name: Restaurant Finder
en-US.description: Find restaurants in a location based on the type of cuisine, or filter the restaurants by price or by Yelp rating. Restaurant details including the address and phone number read to you directly through your Alexa-enabled device with additional information displayed in the companion Alexa application.

en-CA.summary: Find restaurants in a location based on cuisine type, or filter by price or Yelp rating
examplePhrases: find great Chinese restaurants in Toronto
find good Italian restaurants in Vancouver
en-CA.name: Restaurant Finder
en-CA.description: Find restaurants in a location based on the type of cuisine, or filter the restaurants by price or by Yelp rating. Restaurant details including the address and phone number read to you directly through your Alexa-enabled device with additional information displayed in the companion Alexa application.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: This skill walks the user through asking for a list of restaurants, reading the list five at a time, and then providing details about one that the user selects.
